name: SCNParticleInputMode
desc: Options for the input value of the property controller’s animation, used by the inputMode property.

items.name: case overLife
items.desc: The controller’s effect on a particle property is a function of the time since the particle’s birth.

items.name: case overDistance
items.desc: The controller’s effect on a particle property is a function of the particle’s distance from the position of a specified node.

items.name: case overOtherProperty
items.desc: The controller’s effect on a particle property is a function of another of the particle’s properties.
